ValidationRule.description: Practice Management Software required for Customer sync
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: And( ISBLANK ( Practice_Management_Software__c ), ISBLANK( Subscriber_ID__c ), or(RecordTypeId = '012i0000001DyqB', RecordTypeId = '012i0000001DyqC') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must provide a value for Practice Software.
